text: Elba is a city in Coffee County, Alabama, United States. At the 2020 census the population was 3,508. The city is the county seat of Coffee County. ==Education== Public Education is provided by the Elba City Public School District. There are two schools in the city: :Elba High School (grades 7 through 12) :Elba Elementary School (grades K through 6) ==Media== *Radio stations :WELB 1350 AM (Classic Country and Southern Gospel) :WVVL 101.1 FM (Country) ==Notable residents== *James E. "Big Daddy" Folsom, only Coffee County native to become governor of Alabama. *Ronald McKinnon, National Football League player. *Cornelia Ellis Wallace(1939â€“2009), the second wife of Governor George C. Wallace, Jr. and the First Lady of Alabama from 1971-1978\. ==References== Category:Cities in Alabama Category:County seats in Alabama
title: Elba, Alabama
